original_text: Now in these days when the disciples were increasing in number, a complaint by the Hellenists arose against the Hebrews because their widows were being neglected in the daily distribution.
korean_text: 그 때에 제자가 더 많아졌는데 헬라파 유대인들이 자기의 과부들이 매일의 구제에 빠지므로 히브리파 사람을 원망하니

sentences.original_text: when the disciples were increasing in number
a complaint by the Hellenists arose
because their widows were being neglected
sentences.korean_translation: 자기들의 과부들이 돌봄을 받지 못했기 때문이었다
